basics.label: Accountant
basics.summary: Senior-Level IT Finance Management Professional with 20 years of expertise in accounting, financial management, financial analysis, and controllership of IT operating & capital budgets within high-profile corporations.

work.position: Manager / New York State Licensed Real Estate Salesperson
work.summary: Facilitation of marketing and generating client leads. Manage exclusive property listings secured throughout Northern Brooklyn, NY. Successful in closing more than 80 real estate deals in a period of two years.
highlights: Broker application approval pending with New York Department of State

work.summary: Developed and presented the annual budget to the Executive Committee. Supervised over 20 IT leaders. Prepared 5-year long-range plan with IT leadership. Financial architect responsible for evaluating the options to outsource several areas of the IT department.
highlights: Reduced staff from 110 to 46 associates resulting in a projected savings of $12M over a five-year period.

awards.title: Brand Ambassador Award
awards.summary: Received the Brand Ambassador Award in two consecutive years for outstanding performance in real estate

awards.title: MPV Award
awards.summary: Received the MPV Award for leadership.

skills.name: SAP Financials, Oracle Financials, PeopleSoft, Cognos Budgeting System, Microsoft Office, Advanced Excel
